I don't have access to the current events happening in paperback, but i can suggest some ways you can find upcoming events that showcase local art and culture:

1) check the local newspaper or online news outlets for event listings. 2) look up event calendars on websites that focus on local events in paperback. 3) visit the social media pages of museums or galleries in paperback, as they often post about upcoming events. 4) check with the local government or tourism board, as they may have information about upcoming events that highlight local art and culture. by using these resources, you should be able to find information about upcoming festivals and events in paperback that showcase local art and culture.
